name: Mask of Jeram
flavorText: Long ago, a powerful witch doctor named Jeram waged a one-man war on the khazra after they slew his family. To pursue his vendetta, Jeram crafted this terrible mask, capable of calling all manner of beasts and the walking dead to his service. Those who came across the ruined khazra villages—with their dead half devoured, swollen with venom, and scorched by fire—knew it could only be Jeram's work.

secondary.textHtml: Pets deal 157% increased damage. (Witch Doctor Only) [150 - 200]%
